DOC.detailed_description: Cryolipolysis new concept reduce fat since Zeltiq machine introduce several year ago . Several different trial high frequency , liposuction chemical lipolysis remove fat emerge try . Therefore , would like know clinical efficacy cryolipolysis comparative experiment former frequency method thigh healthy Korean woman . Healthy premenopausal woman want reduce fat thigh include . 28 healthy volunteer woman recruit study , 15 subject among participated interviewing , sample metabolic variable initial visit . A total 15 subject would investigate food diary ( 24hour ) , femoral CT , anthropometric , metabolic variable initial , 4th , 12th week . Histological examination skin ( initial 12th week ) , questionnaire ( 4th , 12th week ) satisfaction , adverse event would monitor 3 month .
